verses.verse: Moreover he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou findest; <S%H4672><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> <S%H853><s%> roll, <S%H4039><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
So I opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H853><s%> my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and he caused me to eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H2063><s%> roll. <S%H4039><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> cause thy belly <S%H990><s%> to eat, <S%H398><s%> and fill <S%H4390><s%> thy bowels <S%H4578><s%> with <S%H854><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> roll <S%H4039><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I <S%H589><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H413><s%> thee. Then did I eat <S%H398><s%> it; and it was <S%H1961><s%> in my mouth <S%H6310><s%> as honey <S%H1706><s%> for sweetness. <S%H4966><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> go, <S%H1980><s%> get <S%H935><s%> thee unto <S%H413><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> with my words <S%H1697><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them.

For <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art not <S%H3808><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to <S%H413><s%> a people <S%H5971><s%> of a strange <S%H6012><s%> speech <S%H8193><s%> and of a hard <S%H3515><s%> language, <S%H3956><s%> but to <S%H413><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%>

Not <S%H3808><s%> to <S%H413><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> of a strange <S%H6012><s%> speech <S%H8193><s%> and of a hard <S%H3515><s%> language, <S%H3956><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> thou canst not <S%H3808><s%> understand. <S%H8085><s%> Surely, <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> had I sent <S%H7971><s%> thee to <S%H413><s%> them, they <S%H1992><s%> would have hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee.

But the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will <S%H14><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee; for <S%H3588><s%> they will <S%H14><s%> not <S%H369><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me: for <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> are impudent <S%H2389><s%> <S%H4696><s%> and hardhearted. <S%H7186><s%> <S%H3820><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have made <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> strong <S%H2389><s%> against <S%H5980><s%> their faces, <S%H6440><s%> and <S%H853><s%> thy forehead <S%H4696><s%> strong <S%H2389><s%> against <S%H5980><s%> their foreheads. <S%H4696><s%>

As an adamant <S%H8068><s%> harder <S%H2389><s%> than flint <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6864><s%> have I made <S%H5414><s%> thy forehead: <S%H4696><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> them not, <S%H3808><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> be dismayed <S%H2865><s%> at their looks, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> be a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

Moreover he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I shall speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee receive <S%H3947><s%> in thine heart, <S%H3824><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> with thine ears. <S%H241><s%>

And go, <S%H1980><s%> get <S%H935><s%> thee to <S%H413><s%> them of the captivity, <S%H1473><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of thy people, <S%H5971><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, and tell <S%H559><s%> <S%H413><s%> them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> whether <S%H518><s%> they will hear, <S%H8085><s%> or whether <S%H518><s%> they will forbear. <S%H2308><s%>

Then the spirit <S%H7307><s%> took me up, <S%H5375><s%> and I heard <S%H8085><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> me a voice <S%H6963><s%> of a great <S%H1419><s%> rushing, <S%H7494><s%> saying, Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> from his place. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4725><s%>

I heard also the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the living creatures <S%H2416><s%> that touched <S%H5401><s%> one <S%H802><s%> another, <S%H269><s%> and the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the wheels <S%H212><s%> over against <S%H5980><s%> them, and a noise <S%H6963><s%> of a great <S%H1419><s%> rushing. <S%H7494><s%>

So the spirit <S%H7307><s%> lifted me up, <S%H5375><s%> and took me away, <S%H3947><s%> and I went <S%H1980><s%> in bitterness, <S%H4751><s%> in the heat <S%H2534><s%> of my spirit; <S%H7307><s%> but the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was strong <S%H2389><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> me.

Then I came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> them of the captivity <S%H1473><s%> at Tel-abib, <S%H8512><s%> that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> by <S%H413><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%> of Chebar, <S%H3529><s%> and I sat <S%H3427><s%> where <S%H8033><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> sat, <S%H3427><s%> and remained <S%H3427><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> astonished <S%H8074><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> at the end <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7097><s%> of seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> I have made <S%H5414><s%> thee a watchman <S%H6822><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> therefore hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> at my mouth, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6310><s%> and give them warning <S%H2094><s%> <S%H853><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> me.

When I say <S%H559><s%> unto the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> Thou shalt surely die; <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191><s%> and thou givest him not warning, <S%H2094><s%> <S%H3808><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> speakest <S%H1696><s%> to warn <S%H2094><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> from his wicked <S%H7563><s%> way, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1870><s%> to save his life; <S%H2421><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> wicked <S%H7563><s%> man shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> but his blood <S%H1818><s%> will I require <S%H1245><s%> at thine hand. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%>

Yet if <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> warn <S%H2094><s%> the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> and he turn <S%H7725><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> from his wickedness, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7562><s%> nor from his wicked <S%H7563><s%> way, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1870><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> but thou <S%H859><s%> hast delivered <S%H5337><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy soul. <S%H5315><s%>

Again, When a righteous <S%H6662><s%> man doth turn <S%H7725><s%> from his righteousness, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6664><s%> and commit <S%H6213><s%> iniquity, <S%H5766><s%> and I lay <S%H5414><s%> a stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, he <S%H1931><s%> shall die: <S%H4191><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> thou hast not <S%H3808><s%> given him warning, <S%H2094><s%> he shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his sin, <S%H2403><s%> and his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he hath done <S%H6213><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> be remembered; <S%H2142><s%> but his blood <S%H1818><s%> will I require <S%H1245><s%> at thine hand. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%>

Nevertheless if <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> warn <S%H2094><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> man, that the righteous <S%H6662><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%> not, <S%H1115><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> doth not <S%H3808><s%> sin, <S%H2398><s%> he shall surely live, <S%H2421><s%> <S%H2421><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he is warned; <S%H2094><s%> also thou <S%H859><s%> hast delivered <S%H5337><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy soul. <S%H5315><s%>

And the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> me; and he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Arise, <S%H6965><s%> go forth <S%H3318><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the plain, <S%H1237><s%> and I will there <S%H8033><s%> talk <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee.

Then I arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went forth <S%H3318><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the plain: <S%H1237><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> as the glory <S%H3519><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%> of Chebar: <S%H3529><s%> and I fell <S%H5307><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> my face. <S%H6440><s%>

Then the spirit <S%H7307><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> into me, and set <S%H5975><s%> me upon <S%H5921><s%> my feet, <S%H7272><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H854><s%> me, and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Go, <S%H935><s%> shut thyself <S%H5462><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> thine house. <S%H1004><s%>

But thou, <S%H859><s%> O son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> they shall put <S%H5414><s%> bands <S%H5688><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee, and shall bind <S%H631><s%> thee with them, and thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> go out <S%H3318><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them:

And I will make thy tongue <S%H3956><s%> cleave <S%H1692><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the roof of thy mouth, <S%H2441><s%> that thou shalt be dumb, <S%H481><s%> and shalt not <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> to them a reprover: <S%H376><s%> <S%H3198><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

But when I speak <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee, I will open <S%H6605><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> He that heareth, <S%H8085><s%> let him hear; <S%H8085><s%> and he that forbeareth, <S%H2310><s%> let him forbear: <S%H2308><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>
